pull.title: remove truc_policy from libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES
pull.body: Hebasto pointed out that it doesn't need to be there since it's in `libbitcoin_node_a_SOURCES`

events.message:
remove truc_policy.cpp from libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES

It doesn't need it

Co-authored-by: Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com>

In theory `libbitcoin_wallet` may want to use it at some point? Though, I guess it can be moved back then, if needed.

> In theory `libbitcoin_wallet` may want to use it at some point? Though, I guess it can be moved back then, if needed.

If/when it happens, the `policy/truc_policy.cpp` source file can be moved from `libbitcoin_node.a` to the `libbitcoin_common.a` static library sources.
ACK e8c3b7172c33929e4e5bf6059da2d25a4ea8779c, this change follows the design [docs](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/design/libraries.md).
Ported to the CMake-based build system in https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/pull/264.
